title: 18 Quick Boneless Chicken Breast Recipes Ready in 30 Minutes or Less
description: Find our best boneless chicken breast recipes, all quick and easy to make since these are all ready in less than 30 minutes. With boneless, skinless chicken breasts, it's easy to make a flavorful chicken dinner in a flash!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond 18 Best Boneless Chicken Breast Recipes Ready in 30 Minutes or Less By Carl Hanson Carl Hanson Carl Hanson is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes who has been writing about food and wine for nearly 20 years. He enjoys creating content that informs, entertains, and assists busy home cooks get nourishing meals on the table for their families. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on January 22, 2024 Close Credits: Dotdash Meredith Food Studios When the chips are down and we need dinner on the table fast, we turn, like the rest of America, to skinless, boneless chicken breasts to save the day. Keep a pack of super-versatile boneless, skinless chicken breasts in the freezer, and you'll always have access to quick-and-easy, family-pleasing meals. And to make your chicken dinners even easier to pull together, may we recommend these top-rated recipes — from chicken Marsala to chicken bulgogi, saltimbocca to cordon bleu, they're all crowd favorites and ready in 30 minutes or less. 01 of 19 Southwest Chicken Salad View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole "Romaine is topped with grilled chicken, corn, beans, tomatoes, and onions, and drizzled with a creamy avocado ranch dressing," says Soup Loving Nicole. "This is one hearty salad that hits the spot all year around." 02 of 19 Chicken Marsala View Recipe Save Chicken Marsala | Photo by chibi chef. Ready in 30 minutes. "Lightly coated chicken breasts braised with Marsala wine and mushrooms," says Anonymous. "A delicious, classic chicken dish. Easy and ideal for both a quick weeknight entrée AND serving to company." 22 Chicken and Mushroom Recipes 03 of 19 Keto Open-Faced Chicken Cordon Bleu View Recipe Save France C Ready in 30 minutes. "All the flavors of traditional cordon bleu but keto friendly and much easier to assemble since there is no stuffing or rolling involved," says France C. 04 of 19 Sandy's Chicken Saltimbocca View Recipe Save Photo by Allrecipes. Ready in 30 minutes. You'll wrap pounded chicken cutlets and sage leaves in prosciutto and pan-fry them. "Quick, easy, and so delicious!" says SandyG. 15 Easy 20-Minute Chicken Dinners 05 of 19 Chicken Breasts with Balsamic Vinegar and Garlic View Recipe Save Photo by Dianne. Ready in 30 minutes. Skinless, boneless chicken breasts are browned and paired with an aromatic, garlicky sauce of balsamic vinegar and savory sautéed mushrooms. Serve with roasted potatoes or pasta. "Absolutely loved this recipe!" raves Crystal S. "Very impressive dish that was easy to prepare with ingredients that are normally found in one's kitchen." 06 of 19 Lucky's Quickie Chickie View Recipe Save France C Ready in about 20 minutes. Lucky Noodles recommends using fresh basil here. "Fresh basil gives the essential fresh burst of flavor with a hint of sweet and sour in this dish," she says. "The ingredients are all on hand when my herb garden is in season! Add a salad and a favorite vegetable for a quick weeknight meal." 15 Ways to Use up Fresh Basil 07 of 19 Chicken In Basil Cream View Recipe Save kristen Ready in 30 minutes. Fried chicken cutlets get a major flavor upgrade when paired with this basil cream sauce. "This is wonderful! The sauce is divine!" raves Rebecca Jo. "I would double the sauce so you have enough to drizzle on a side of pasta. I pounded the chicken breasts thin." Our 10 Best Chicken Cutlet Recipes of All Time Are the Quick Meals You Need This Week 08 of 19 Skillet Chicken Bulgogi View Recipe Save Photo by DIZ#9829;. DIZ#9829; Ready in 30 minutes. "This is a quick and easy, but very tasty meal," says daveparks4. "You can substitute the chicken with beef or pork for variety. My wife and I absolutely love this recipe, and it only takes thirty minutes with very few dirty dishes! Serve over rice." 09 of 19 Chicken Mushroom Dijon View Recipe Save Photo by Marianne. Ready in 30 minutes. "This is a great easy recipe for last-minute guests or a busy weeknight when you want something a little special," says DebbyJean. "You may want to double the mushroom sauce and serve it over rice." 10 of 19 Quick Chicken Piccata View Recipe Save Sydney Bassing Ready in just 25 minutes, this restaurant-worthy chicken piccata feels fancy but couldn't be easier to make. Chef John's recipe has garnered more than 1,000 glowing reviews, so you can be sure it's worth a try! Chef John's Best Italian Recipes 11 of 19 Spicy Basil Chicken View Recipe Save Photo by na0m1p. Ready in 30 minutes. Here's a Thai-inspired meal that's great for weeknights. Pieces of skinless, boneless chicken breast are sautéed with garlic and chile pepper flakes and cooked briefly with mushrooms, onions, and a little oyster sauce. "DELICIOUS!" raves pinksnowflakeliz. "It tasted robust and flavorful and was super easy to make." 12 of 19 Saltimbocca di Pollo alla Romana (Prosciutto-Stuffed Chicken Breast Roulades) View Recipe Save Photo by Kim's Cooking Now. Ready in about 30 minutes. Elegant yet so easy, you'll pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts thin and stuff them with prosciutto and sage. It's a quick, flavorful Italian meal that requires just a few ingredients. 18 Quick and Easy Italian Dinners Ready in 45 Minutes or Less 13 of 19 Mediterranean Chicken View Recipe Save Photo by pomplemousse. Ready in about 30 minutes. Skinless, boneless chicken breast halves are sautéed and then simmered in a sauce of tomatoes, olives, white wine, garlic, and herbs. "This dish was absolutely terrific," says Sara S. "I tossed some fresh feta cheese over the top of it, which really added to the flavor. And the aroma was to die for -- I highly recommend this!" 14 of 19 Five-Ingredient Red Curry Chicken View Recipe Save Culinary Envy This weeknight recipe covers all the bases. "Five-ingredient red curry chicken with noodles is easy, quick, and inexpensive to make," says Culinary Envy. "Sweetened with coconut milk for unbelievable flavor! Top with chopped cilantro, green onions, and red chile peppers if desired." 15 of 19 Tomato Basil Chicken View Recipe Save Photo by MariaTheSoaper. Ready in 30 minutes. "This takes almost no time to prepare, and you can even do the tomato/basil mixture the night before," says Donna Bracchi Sullivan. "It will be a hit." 16 of 19 Garlic Chicken Stir Fry View Recipe Save Linda C. A quick chicken stir-fry with plenty of healthy vegetables, garlic, and ginger, with a lightly sweetened soy sauce! To make weeknight stir-fries even easier, make a big batch of brown rice on the weekends. Our 20 Best Stir-Fry Recipes That Are Even Better Than Take-Out 17 of 19 Quick and Easy Chicken Lazone View Recipe Save Yoly Here's an ideal weeknight dinner that is ready in less than 30 minutes. Serve over or with noodles, rice, or potatoes. Quick, easy, and delicious. Top with chiffonade basil leaves. 18 of 19 Crunchy French Onion Chicken View Recipe Save Dotdash Meredith Food Studios It's hard to believe that just three ingredients results in these tasty chicken breasts with loads of crunch. 19 Easy Dinners You Only Need 3 Ingredients to Make 19 of 19 More Inspiration 14 Simple Sheet Pan Chicken Dinners Pictured: Florentine Stuffed Chicken More Chicken Breasts Recipes Explore more: Everyday Cooking Quick and Easy Main Dishes Chicken Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
